entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
